channel.title: Need help changing the name of Galkon client [317]
channel.description: i looked freaking eveerrryywhheerreee to change the name of the client. What i mean is i want to change the name on the upper left hand corner. I've looked in the Client.java, the Egui.java, and the Appletsub_1.java. I wonder if for this client it uses some sort of code or i dont even know. IF someone could tell me how i could change that little tiny name in the corner, id love you forever.... It should be really simple, but its not :/

item.title: Need help changing the name of Galkon client [317]
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

:o, I have been misinformed! Or actually, not misinformed. I’ve just forgotten.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help changing the name of Galkon client [317]

item.title: Need help changing the name of Galkon client [317]
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Galkons is renamed, and doesn’t come with a JFrame in the regular version, you should be able to find it in the RSFrame class.

Scape-JAVA:

Jframe or applet_sub1

The client name is not usually in Applet_Sub1, that class usually contains stuff related to the mouse, clicking, etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help changing the name of Galkon client [317]
